item.title: Hot Showers Actually Decrease Core Body Temperature

item.title: When Sleeping, the Goal is to Decrease Core Body Temperature
item.description: When Sleeping, the Goal is to Decrease Core Body Temperature [[Hot Showers Actually Decrease Core Body Temperature]] In contrast, [[When Waking Up, the Goal is to Increase Core Body Temperature]]

item.title: When Waking Up, the Goal is to Increase Core Body Temperature
item.description: When Waking Up, the Goal is to Increase Core Body Temperature [[Cold Showers Actually Increase Core Body Temperature]] In contrast, [[When Sleeping, the Goal is to Decrease Core Body Temperature]]
